front: George Washington was the first president
John Adams was the second president
John Elway played for the denver broncos
James Comey was the FBI director that was fired by Donald Trump
Founded in 1607, Jamestown was considered to be the first english settlement in the new world
Formerly known as Bedloe's Island, Liberty Island is the current name of the island where the Statue of Liberty is located
Glacier National Park is located in the Northwest corner of Montana and has the nickname 'Crown of the Continent'
Donald Trump is the oldest person to be elected to the office of President of the United States
The Statue of Liberty holds a torch in her right hand
Pony Express is the name of the US Mail service started in 1860 that used horses and riders
